author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Sykes: Above is my new address. Did you return the typescript. A copy arrived about a week ago but my family opened the wrapper so I don’t know if it is yours or Eliot’s. This is Valery Larbaud’s flat in a charming little quarter situated in a kind of park. Giorgio went to Zurich on Thursday for a month’s holiday. Kind regards to Mrs Sykes and yourself from us both Sincerely yours James Joyce
